title: Why does a golf cart have to be liscened and insured, as a car does,and have a speed limit under 25 mph. yet a 16 year old with no liscense, insurance, etc. can drive a moped 30 mph. as long as he,she wears a helmet ????? Some one needs to wake up the person who make up these rules.
